channel.title: CVE Feed for RICOH COMPANY, LTD. -- Installer of Device Software Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RICOH COMPANY, LTD. -- Installer of Device Software Manager

item.title: CVE-2022-36403|2024-08-03T10:00:04.394Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- installer%20of%20device%20software%20manager
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installer of Device Software Manager prior to Ver.2.20.3.0 allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
